title: Vegetarian Spinach Vegetable Lasagna with Tomato Sauce
instructions: Chop the carrots, mushrooms, and onion. Sauté onion in a pan until translucent, then add the other vegetables and sauté briefly. Add milk and heat the cream spinach until thawed and slightly thickened. Stir in cream cheese and vegetable broth powder, simmering for five minutes. Add one clove of garlic, season with salt, pepper, and chili. In another pot, melt the butter, add flour, and make a smooth mixture. Gradually add tomato puree and then sweet cream, bringing to a boil. Press in another clove of garlic, seasoning with salt and pepper. Start layering in a baking dish with a thin layer of tomato sauce and spinach mixture, alternating with lasagna sheets. Top with sauce and cheese. Bake at 180°C for about 30 minutes and let it rest for 5-10 minutes in the oven to maintain shape.
